Great day for North Carolina, especially Kannapolis, with the grand opening of the NC Food Innovation Lab.  This facility, complete with state of the art equipment, will serve as a catalyst for plant-based food research and food manufacturing.  #ncpol #GotToBeNC https://t.co/24nQjd6KRO

Itâ€™s a new day in food processing with the ribbon cutting of the NC Food Innovation Lab in Kannapolis.  Itâ€™s full of state of the art equipment to use for plant-based food research and food manufacturing.

Happy #Earthday! Here are some simple ways to help combat climate change, and protect the earth and its creatures. 
1. Turn the lights off every time you leave a room
2. Switch to a more plant-based diet. 
3. Purchase a reusable straw. 
4. Donâ€™t waste food!
5. Recycle, obviously
